title: Leather: Elegant Watch Face
summary: Get a leather total look! 10 very elegant watch faces for both male and female
description: Leather never goes out of fashion, and every now and again it’s right back in style. It has this classic elegance, a timeless beauty, but can also be avant-garde, crazy and wild.We’ve created this series of watch faces inspired by its wealth of textures, finishes (matt, gloss, patent) and colors, above all black, but not forgetting shades of brown, burgundy and gray or more vivid hues.Get a stylish face for your watch: a watch with a leather motif looks great on both men and women.Put together with contemporary electronics, the design is really surprising! Use it as an accessory or as the highlight of your total leather look.Features:* sleek, deep colors and textures * 10 elegant faces for your watch* subtly-lit hands when in ambient mode* battery indicator and date shown on face* face sustains battery lifeGet a leather total look! For watches with both round and square faces.
descriptionHTML:
Leather never goes out of fashion, and every now and again it’s right back in style. It has this classic elegance, a timeless beauty, but can also be avant-garde, crazy and wild.

We’ve created this series of watch faces inspired by its wealth of textures, finishes (matt, gloss, patent) and colors, above all black, but not forgetting shades of brown, burgundy and gray or more vivid hues.

Get a stylish face for your watch:
a watch with a leather motif looks great on both men and women.

Put together with contemporary electronics, the design is really surprising!
Use it as an accessory or as the highlight of your total leather look.

Features:
* sleek, deep colors and textures
* 10 elegant faces for your watch
* subtly-lit hands when in ambient mode
* battery indicator and date shown on face
* face sustains battery life

Get a leather total look!

For watches with both round and square faces.
